statements: SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts;
SELECT id, timestamp, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT user_id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE message LIKE '%hello%';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = '1' ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY message_count DESC
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-06-01' AND '2021-06-30'
SELECT id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT name, position FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT name, position, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE sender_id = 1 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE receiver_id = 2 AND sender_id != 2;
SELECT COUNT(*) as total_transcripts FROM chat_transcripts WHERE receiver_id = 3 GROUP BY receiver_id;
SELECT sender_id, receiver_id, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE receiver_id = 4 AND sender_id = 5 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT e.name, e.department, c.timestamp FROM employees e INNER JOIN chat_transcripts c ON e.employee_id = c.sender_id WHERE e.position = 'Manager';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(transcript_id) AS total_transcripts FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT transcript_id, message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 3 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT session_id, user_id, start_time, end_time FROM sessions ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT transcript_id, message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 456 AND message LIKE '%important%' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT username, role FROM users LEFT JOIN sessions ON users.user_id = sessions.user_id WHERE sessions.end_time <= '2022-03-15' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT session_id, users.username, sessions.start_time, sessions.end_time FROM sessions JOIN users ON sessions.user_id = users.user_id ORDER BY sessions.start_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS message_count FROM chat_transcripts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT room_name FROM rooms ORDER BY room_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transcript_id, message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 3;
SELECT c.conversation_id, u.username, r.room_name FROM conversations c JOIN users u ON c.user_id = u.user_id JOIN rooms r ON c.room_id = r.room_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transcripts FROM chat_transcripts WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE sender_id = 1;
SELECT message, timestamp FROM chat_transcripts WHERE receiver_id = 5;
SELECT user_id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'JohnDoe';
SELECT * FROM conversations ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT transcript_id, message, timestamp FROM chat_logs WHERE message LIKE '%important%';
SELECT * FROM chat_transcripts WHERE sender_id = 1 AND receiver_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT message FROM chat_transcripts WHERE id = 3
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 5
SELECT transcript_id, message FROM chat_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transcripts FROM transcripts_meta WHERE status = 'completed'
